name: Hotel Cancellation Booking Data Visualization
description: An analysis on what affects the rate of cancellation of a certain hotel sector , is it the events that occur surrounding it ? the customer services ? the offers?

name: Symptoms Based Disease Classification
description: A collaboration between computer science and healthcare students, resulting in the successful creation of a user-friendly website for pre-diagnosing non-communicable diseases (NCDs).
